attributes.additional_details: The risk of appointing three prime ministers in one year is to high, it’s likely to add even more instability and uncertainty to the markets and the country. If the conservative party want any chance of improving their position in the polls, Boris is the man for the job.
attributes.background: The Conservative Party need to re-appoint Boris Johnson as Prime minister, it is their only democratic option left without holding a general election. Boris is the only candidate who can bring back stability to the country.

rejection.details: Decisions about changes to the leaders of political parties are a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
